text: The John Burrier House, in Fayette County, Kentucky on Kentucky Route 1966 near Lexington, was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1983. It is a one-story three-bay dry stone wing of a former two-story house. It is also known as the Stone Grange and as Burrier Place. title: John Burrier House
